Package gobblin.writer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MetadataAwareWriter
    Represents a Writer that is metadata aware.
    Retriable
    Interface that provides RetryerBuilder so that specific Retry logic can be injected.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AvroDataWriterBuilder
    A DataWriterBuilder for building DataWriter that writes in Avro format.
    AvroHdfsDataWriter
    An extension to FsDataWriter that writes in Avro format in the form of GenericRecords.
    ConsoleWriter<D>
    A simple console writer that prints the record to stdout
    ConsoleWriterBuilder<D>  
    DataWriterWrapperBuilder<D>
    The purpose of this class is to add more feature to DataWriter such as retry or throttle.
    FsDataWriter<D>
    An implementation of DataWriter does the work of setting the output/staging dir and creating the FileSystem instance.
    FsDataWriterBuilder<S,D>
    A abstract DataWriterBuilder for building DataWriters that write to FileSystems.
    HiveWritableHdfsDataWriter
    An extension to FsDataWriter that writes Writable records using an OutputFormat that implements HiveOutputFormat.
    HiveWritableHdfsDataWriterBuilder<S>
    A DataWriterBuilder for building HiveWritableHdfsDataWriter.
    JdbcWriter
    Uses JDBC to persist data in task level.
    JdbcWriterBuilder  
    MetadataWriterWrapper<D>
    Wraps an existing DataWriter and makes it metadata aware.
    PartitionedDataWriter<S,D>
    DataWriter that partitions data using a partitioner, instantiates appropriate writers, and sends records to the chosen writer.
    RetryWriter<D>
    Retry writer follows decorator pattern that retries on inner writer's failure.
    SchemaBasedPartitionedDataWriterBuilder
    A DataWriterBuilder that uses name field of DataWriterBuilder.schema in path name and overrides SchemaBasedPartitionedDataWriterBuilder.getSchema() to use PartitionAwareDataWriterBuilder.partition Must be used with SchemaBasedWriterPartitioner
    SimpleDataWriter
    An implementation of DataWriter that writes bytes directly to HDFS.
    SimpleDataWriterBuilder
    A DataWriterBuilder for building DataWriter that writes bytes.
    ThrottleWriter<D>
    Throttle writer follows decorator pattern that throttles inner writer by either QPS or by bytes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ThrottleWriter.ThrottleType
